meanings.definition: The act or process of producing strobilations.
meanings.sent1: The strobilations of the fireflies lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the strobilations of pine cones falling.
meanings.sent3: The strobilations of the popcorn machine made everyone crave a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like joyful strobilations.
meanings.sent5: The strobilations of the drumbeats set the rhythm for the dancers.

meanings.sent1: The mesmerizing strobilations of the disco ball captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with the rhythmic strobilations of the flashing lights.
meanings.sent3: The strobilations of the flickering candle flames created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the city, she found peace in the gentle strobilations of the fountain.
meanings.sent5: The strobilations of the changing traffic lights guided the flow of cars.
